title: Brand Identity Designer
responsibilities: Develop and create innovative visual identities that align with clients' brand goals and values.
Design logos, color schemes, typography, and other visual elements that maintain brand consistency across all platforms.
Collaborate closely with the creative team to ensure visual assets meet project objectives and client expectations.
Conduct research on industry trends and competitor analysis to inform design decisions.
Present and communicate design concepts and rationale to internal teams and clients.
Adapt designs based on feedback and critique from team members and stakeholders.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively to meet deadlines.
Stay updated on design trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve skills and approaches.
requirements: Proven experience as a Brand Identity Designer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful brand identity projects.
Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign).
Solid understanding of branding principles, including visual hierarchy, typography, color theory, and composition.
Ability to work with luxury approach designs, delivering high-end, sophisticated visuals.
Excellent communication skills with the ability to present and articulate design concepts effectively.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a hybrid work environment.
Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work under tight deadlines.
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field is preferred.
benefits: Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
Hybrid work model allowing flexibility between remote work and office-based collaboration in Cairo.
Opportunities for professional growth and development through ongoing training and mentorship.
Join a dynamic and creative team that values innovation, creativity, and excellence.
application: To apply, send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter to career@thedivasolutions.com with the subject line 'Application for Brand Identity Designer - [Your Full Name]'.
